definition: to cheat on one's spouse/to have an affair

sentences.english: He looks like the cat that ate the canary .
sentences.chinese: 他看起來像只偷腥的貓。

sentences.english: When he was "eating sushi" the night, he got caught by his wife.
sentences.chinese: 他那天晚上“偷腥”的時候，給他老婆抓住了。

sentences.english: But it seems having endless options hasn't stopped couples from straying.
sentences.chinese: 不過看起來擁有無限的選擇並沒能阻止人們去偷腥。

sentences.english: He looks like the cat that ate the canary.
sentences.chinese: 他看起來向只偷腥的貓。

definition: to carry on a clandestine love affair
to fondle the flowers and trample the grass (idiom)/to womanize/to frequent brothels/to sow one's wild oats
lit. the red apricot tree leans over the garden wall (idiom)/fig. a wife having an illicit lover
lit. to pick the flowers and trample the grass (idiom)/fig. to womanize/to frequent brothels/to sow one's wild oats
derailment (railway accident)/to leave the rails/fig. to overstep bounds/fig. to have an extramarital affair
lit. a dog can't stop himself from eating shit (idiom)/fig. bad habits are hard to change
pinyin: gou3 gai3 bu4 liao3 chi1 shi3

definition: lit. to enjoy the beautiful spring scenery (idiom)/fig. to frequent brothels/to sow one's wild oats
to have a foot in both camps/to have a bet each way/to be having an affair
a cuckold/to be cuckolded by one's wife
lit. to stand with each foot in a different boat (idiom)/fig. to have it both ways/to run after two hares/(especially) to have two lovers at the same time
to catch a couple in the act (adultery, illicit sexual relations)
to eat on the sly/to pilfer food/to be unfaithful
